title: Fractional Knapsack
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Given items with Weight and Value, fill knapsack of capacity W. You CAN take fractions of items. 
Algo: Sort by **Value/Weight**. Take as much of best ratio as possible.

common_mistakes.correction: If you can't break items (Gold bars), Greedy fails. Must use DP.

summary: Take the most valuable dust first.
